author: sebor
msg: to safely convert a plain char argument to the generic charT before
passing it to the tested function to silence HP aCC remark #4271-D:
(make_LC_TIME): Handled fopen() failure to silence warning #20200-D:
Potential null pointer dereference is detected.

author: sebor
msg: * tests/src/locale.cpp (rw_localedef): Used __FILE__ to try to get
the value of TOPDIR when the environment variable is unset or empty.

author: veithen
msg: JMX: Added MBeans to query the services listening on a given transport.

author: jlaskowski
msg: New junit test - ConfigurationFactoryTest - and its implications:
- Introduce forkMode always of maven-surefire-plugin (it's because some tests might rely on SystemInstance.get() being static)
- Externalize messages to their message bundles
